content: पतित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Fallen, descended, alighted. {@--2@} Dropped. {@--3@} Fallen (in a moral sense), abandoned, wicked. {@--4@} A prostate. {@--5@} Degraded, outcast. {@--6@} Fallen in battle, defeated or overthrown. {@--7@} Being in, fallen into; as in अवंशपतित. {@--8@} Placed, kept; <ls>Pt. 1. 14.</ls> --तं Flying.
